column5: Ok, I'm sitting here waiting it out for another week. Decide to go for a drive to have a look at the stream. I'm talking out in Oshawa here. Small creek runs between Thorton St and Simcoe St.. Anyway, as I get there there are about 8-10 cars parked and everyone going nuts on fishing. Asked one guy and he's already got 2 bows in hand..  Like ... seriously ??  Am I wrong, did I miss the boat here. I just looked at the regs Zone 17 and it say's( last Sat of April ) .  You gotta see this place.. fish are gone now.. So pissed....  Tiz
Oh you missed the boat all right!
Ah well.. All that gettin ready and anticipation will wait for another week.. Who knew there were 5 Sat's in April.. My bad..  Tiz
No you didnt miss the boat. It will be back to the dock soon with the first load of trout hunters, and picking up the stragglers.
